TITLE Antipasto Smothered Chicken

{[Antipasto Mix]
# In a bowl combine, [2 tbl olive oil], [1/3 cup [chopped] marinated artichoke hearts], [1/3 cup [chopped] salami], [1/4 cup [chopped] pepperoncini], and [2 tbl red-wine vinegar], and [1 tbl [chopped] fresh oregano]
}

# Preeheat broiler.
# Season [1 lbs chicken breast] with [1/2 tsp ground pepper] and [salt].
# In a large oven proof pan saute chicken until mostly cooked through.
# Smother chicken with $[Antipasto Mix] and top with [2 oz fresh mozzarella cheese].
# Broil until chicken is cooked through and the cheese is melted.
